subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. put Nebraska on two years of probation and agreed to a self-imposed fine of $38,000 as part of an impermissible benefits case involving textbooks and school supplies.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. put Nebraska on two years of probation and agreed to a self-imposed fine of $38,000 as part of an impermissible benefits case involving textbooks and school supplies.
